Articles.Content:
ZeroScienceContracts removes the science rewards from the contracts.

License: public domain.

Source code: included in the package.

Thanks to FlowerChild for the code.

Download: ZeroScienceContracts.zip

Note: the mod uses the OnContractsListChange event. So, if you install the mod and load a savegame that was created without the mod, the current available contracts will still have science rewards. To fix that, just refuse a contract (or do something that changes the contract list) so that the mod will updated the contracts and remove the science rewards.

Edited December 16, 2014 by acerola
